title: How long does it take -on average- for the support team to get back to you?
body:
Based on my experience, it usually takes a few hours. However, the current problem i have isn't solved yet. I emailed them yesterday, got an email at ~3AM in my time zone, but all it says is "I'll need to transfer you to our Accounts Department. There might be a 'short' delay."
Still waiting on that reply.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: I took a look into this for you and see that you have two tickets open, so one will likely be closed to prevent delays or confusion in responding to your ticket.  I've confirmed it's been escalated to our account team who will help you out individually.  It may be a bit longer depending on the size of the queue for the day.  Hang tight and we'll reach out as soon as we can!

And yet, here I am, 9 hours later, without a reply. {{champion:32}}
EDIT: Still waiting. 21 hours since the 'short delay' notice.{{champion:32}}
